name: Cocktail Nation
description: Decidedly ironic take on Lounge that emerged in the early 1990s.

name: Exotica
description: Emerged in the early 1950s as the United States developed a fascination with Polynesia and the South Pacific, incorporating traditional and rhythms from these cultures into a Western Pop context.

name: Light Music
description: Mainly British instrumentals designed to appeal to a wider audience.

name: Lounge
description: Emerged in the United States during the 1950s, emphasizing a chilled-out atmosphere with light instrumentation and sometimes vocals indebted to Vocal Jazz.

name: Pops Orchestra
description: Orchestra that plays covers of popular songs as well as famous classical compositions.

name: Space Age Pop
description: Inspired by the excitement and optimism of the Space Age during the 1950s and 1960s, frequently experimenting with futuristic sounds made possible by contemporary technology.
